Go to staging.new.expensify.com 2. Go to self DM 3. Create two expenses of different currency 4. Go to workspace chat 5. Create an empty report 6. Open the empty report 7. Click Add to report ## Expected Result: Out-of-pocket spend & Company spend will not appear because both expenses are non-reimbursable ## Actual Result: Out-of-pocket spend & Company spend appears when non-reimbursable expenses of different currency are added to the report Out-of-pocket spend & Company spend disappear after refreshing the page ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: Select the officially supported platforms where the issue was reproduced: - [x] Android: App - [x] Android: mWeb Chrome - [x] iOS: App - [x] iOS: mWeb Safari - [x] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [x] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [x] MacOS: Desktop

title: Upgrade cocoapods to 1.16.2+

labels.name: External
labels.description: Added to denote the issue can be worked on by a contributor

labels.name: Daily
labels.description: KSv2

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: Something is broken. Auto assigns a BugZero manager.

body:
### Problem
A little while ago, we [attempted to upgrade cocoapods to 1.16](https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/70917/files) to patch a vulnerability.

However, the snyk PR was not correct on its own - it did not upgrade the `Podfile.lock`, so `bundle exec pod install` started failing.

### Solution
Upgrade cocoapods to `1.16.2+`. Update Pods and `Podfile.lock` accordingly.

<details><summary>Issue Owner</summary>Current Issue Owner: @QichenZhu</details>

User A create 2 expenses to User B 2. On report page User A mention User C 3. User A select "Invite to chat only" 4. User C open the mention chat 5. User C select one of the expenses> Hold the expens 6. Verify error appear 7. Open the expense detail page and dismiss the error> Go back to report ## Expected Result: Since User C is invited to chat only there should be no Hold option available. ## Actual Result: User C can unsuccessfully hold the expense, and when dismiss the error "This expense was put on hold" still remains ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [ ] Android: App - [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [ ] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/69e4669e-e5fb-47aa-b247-0ab318654b0b [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)

Launch app 2. Go to workspace settings 3. Tap reports 4. Enable Report fields 5. Tap add field 6. Enter name as "A" in caps 7. Select type " Text" 8. Set initial value {field:a} 9. Tap save 10. Tap add field 11. Enter name as "a" in lowercase 12. Select type as "text" 13. Set initial value as {field:b} 14. Note instead of 2 fields, only second added field is shown in lists ## Expected Result: Since both field names are saved successfully, both fields (A and a) should be shown in the list. ## Actual Result: Only the second field (“a”) is shown in the report field list. The first field (“A”) disappears after adding the second field with the same name in lowercase. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: App - [x] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [ ] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/27885a1d-bc9d-48cf-a918-12c03b6e03c1 [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)

title: [$250] Update homescreen app shortcuts on iOS and Android

labels.name: External
labels.description: Added to denote the issue can be worked on by a contributor

labels.name: Daily
labels.description: KSv2

labels.name: Help Wanted
labels.description: Apply this label when an issue is open to proposals by contributors

body:
## Problem When long-pressing an app icon on Android and iOS, you are shown some specific app shortcuts. These icons and terminology isn't up to date, so let's update them. This is what it looks like today: - The icons are too big and wrong - The terminology is outdated ## Solution Let's update the following things to ensure they're correct: - `SmartScan` becomes `Scan receipt` - `Log distance` becomes `Track distance` - `Manually create` becomes `Create expense` All icons should also be updated: - [Camera icon](https://github.com/Expensify/App/blob/main/assets/images/camera.svg) - [Location icon](https://github.com/Expensify/App/blob/main/assets/images/location.svg) - [Expense icon](https://github.com/Expensify/App/blob/main/assets/images/receipt.svg) cc @Expensify/design @Expensify/product-pr

If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** v9.2.47-0 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** Yes **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** Exploratory around https://test-management.browserstack.com/projects/2219752/test-runs/TR-1880/folder/13176676/41236544/1002489875?p=2 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** kiatest.78+ck117251@gmail.com **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Device used:** iPhone 16/iOS 18.7.1 **App Component:** Workspace Settings ## Action Performed: 1. Launch Hybrid app & sign in with gmail account 2. Create workspace >> More features >> enable tags 3. Navigate to Tags option 4. Add few tags 5. Tap More >> Import spreadsheet 6. Select either Single level of tags or Multi-level tags (upgrade to control WS) 7. Click "download a backup" link 8. Cancel the download (do not save CSV export) 9. Click Cancel (or Switch Tag Levels) 10. Try clicking either Multi-level tags, Single level tags or back button in import tags page ## Expected Result: App should not freeze on import tags page after cancelling tags download backup. User should able to go back to add tag page ## Actual Result: App freezes on import tags page when download backup is cancelled ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [ ] Android: App - [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome - [x] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [ ] Windows: Chrome - [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [ ] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/bf0d28a1-5f25-4162-afe5-05f41aaff3d2 [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)

labels.name: Awaiting Payment

labels.description: Something is broken. Auto assigns a BugZero manager.

body:
If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 9.2.47-0 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** No **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/73354 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** sojdnosjsodjosj1@gmail.com **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Device used:** Mac 15.5 / Chrome **App Component:** Money Requests ## Action Performed: Precondition: - Account has a workspace. 1. Go to staging.new.expensify.com 2. Open FAB > Create expense > Manual. 3. Enter amount > Next. 4. On confirm page, click To field. 5. Select a user (not workspace). 6. On confirm page, click RHP back button. 7. On input page, add a negative sign to the amount. 8. Click Next. 9. Click Create expense. ## Expected Result: In Step 8, after changing the amount to negative, Confirm page should reset To field to the default workspace, because we are not allowed to submit negative expense to 1:1 user. ## Actual Result: In Step 8, after changing the amount to negative, Confirm page does not reset To field to the default workspace. As a result, the negative expense can be submitted to the user, but the submitted expense is not negative. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: App - [x] Android: mWeb Chrome - [x] iOS: App - [x] iOS: mWeb Safari - [x] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [ ] Windows: Chrome - [x] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [x] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/e7909c9f-8592-48af-b4b6-0fd37523754d [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)
